alert.note: Alert for Boone County Except Southwest; Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Marion; Newton County Higher Elevations; Newton County Lower Elevations; Northwest Searcy County Higher Elevations; Searcy County Lower Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 2:39PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Searcy, northeastern Newton, southwestern Marion and southeastern Boone Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 238 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Western Grove, or 14 miles east of Jasper, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marshall... Yellville... Western Grove... Valley Springs... Dugger... Carver... Duff... Crawford... Point Peter... Maumee... Everton... St. Joe... Pindall... Gilbert... Zach... Yardelle... Ralph... Silver Hill... Eros... Bruno... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
